topics.body:
We ep14 now 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]A NEW CHALLENGER APPROACHES 

Yutaka get 

ALL NIGHT COMPUTER, WELCOME TO THE NIGHTLIFE YUTAKA 

caller ID: savior of the universe 

"i was bored so i actually talked to a telemarketer" jeez how can anyone be THAT bored 

"smoking or non-smoking?" do we look old enough to smoke >_> 

what even is Konata's dad 

Yutaka is kinda like Chiyo from Azumanga Daioh now that i think about it 

"po-CKY" 

hey Konata you can cosplay as yourself 

"Excuse me, officer, we're underage" only in Lucky Star XD 

oh god poor Yutaka "you'll live" 

NO YUTAKA, KONATA IS NOT A GOOD ROLE MODEL XD 

Yui is less of a good role model, and she's a cop XD 

"MY FINAL ANSWER... is my ass, buddy" jeez Akira 

she's soliciting votes to get into the show now XD 

seriously how are both of her personalities the same character... she's right about one thing, her acting abilities are second to none XD[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

so did they get rid of the karaoke segments or what 

seriously what even are the ending segments now
